duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure operations meet company standards in all restaurant zones during a shift.
Act as manager on duty and open and close the restaurant.
Manage cash handling and ensure accountability.
Utilize necessary tools, forms, and logs to support shift execution and document results.
Utilize reward and recognition program for the crewmembers.
Ensure cleanliness of the restaurant and that the facility is in good working order.
Authorize employee functions requiring manager approval.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required, some college preferred. Must complete all required company training programs.
